titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanders
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture 34 is hereby sustained. The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska ("Marshal") is hereby authorized to seize the Taurus 9 mm handgun, serial number TXF83334. The Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the United States of America for disposition in accordance with the law. The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by the Marshal in his secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture in which all interests shall be addressed as to defendant Marques Sanders. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. - (2 certified copies to the USM) (KBJ)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture 34 is hereby sustained. The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska ("Marshal") is hereby authorized to seize the Taurus 9 mm handgun, serial number TXF83334. The Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the United States of America for disposition in accordance with the law. The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by the Marshal in his secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture in which all interests shall be addressed as to defendant Marques Sanders. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. - (2 certified copies to the USM) (KBJ)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanders
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Marques Sanders (1), Count 1 - DEFENDANT pleaded guilty to counts I and II of the Indictment and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of thirty (30) months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 special assessment; Count 2 - Final order of forfeiture filed on 09/28/2007 as to Count IIas to defendant Marques Sanders. Exhibit Deadline set for 1/15/2008. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (4 certified copies to US Marshal)(ADB)

Exhibit Deadline set for 1/15/2008. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (4 certified copies to US Marshal)(ADB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanders
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER that the defendant shall be released on or before 8:30 am on 9/22/2010 and transported by a member of the Federal Public Defender's Office to the Stephen Center HERO Program with the same terms and conditions as previously imposed as to defendant Marques Sanders. ACCESS TO THE PDF DOCUMENT IS RESTRICTED PURSUANT TO THE E-GOVERNMENT ACT. ACCESS IS LIMITED TO COUNSEL OF RECORD AND THE COURT. Ordered by Chief Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (1 Certified copy to USM) (JSF)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Sanders
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT for Revocation of Probation or Supervised Release as to Marques Sanders (1)- DEFENDANT admitted guilt to violation of Special Condition #2 of the term of supervision and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of eighteen (18) months with no supervised release to follow; $100.00 special assessment (a balance of $25 remains due and payble) as to defendant Marques Sanders. Ordered by Chief Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (1 Certified copy to USM)(ADB, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT for Revocation of Probation or Supervised Release as to Marques Sanders (1)- DEFENDANT admitted guilt to violation of Special Condition #2 of the term of supervision and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of eighteen (18) months with no supervised release to follow; $100.00 special assessment (a balance of $25 remains due and payble) as to defendant Marques Sanders. Ordered by Chief Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (1 Certified copy to USM)(ADB, )
